类 ClientGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientGUI

  • public class ClientGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientGUI handles the connection to the server.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ClientGUI()
      set the port to 8189

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      clear the array that contains password, for safty

      This method should be called after connection to remote server has been established to download PDF file of reagents list from server.

      This method should be called after connection to remote server has been established to get one line of echo from server.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ClientGUI

        public ClientGUI()
        set the port to 8189

    • 方法详细资料

      • setServerIP

        public void setServerIP(java.lang.String ip)
        set the server IP address
        参数:
        ip - IP address of the server. for example
        192.168.1.105

      • setPasswd

        public void setPasswd(char[] passwd)
        set the password required for login
        参数:
        passwd - Password to visit the server

      • login

        public boolean login()
        This method should be called after setting the correct server IP and password to connect the remote server.
        返回:
        true if server connected, false if not

      • sendTo

        public void sendTo(java.lang.String command)
        This method should be called after connection to remote server has been established to send one line of command to server.
        参数:
        command - one line of command to be sent to server

      • getFrom

        public java.lang.String getFrom()
        This method should be called after connection to remote server has been established to get one line of echo from server.
        返回:
        echo line from server

      • downloadPDF

        public boolean downloadPDF(java.io.File file)
        This method should be called after connection to remote server has been established to download PDF file of reagents list from server.
        参数:
        file - the file that the PDF would be ssaved to
        返回:
        true if PDF downloaded, false if not

      • clearPasswd

        private void clearPasswd()
        clear the array that contains password, for safty

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        server IP and port. For example
        192.168.1.105:8189
